reviewText:
The game is completely uninspired. No tutorials, not a god damn clue on how to play the game.
Guns and missiles are weak, if you overheat your minigun the cool down takes too damn long.
Enemy missiles are practically invisble, as are enemies flying toward you leave a trace behind where the missile hides.

Game's unplayable and too boring.
